trans-unit.source: Contains information about how bitmap and metafile colors are manipulated during rendering.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關如何會在呈現期間操作點陣圖和中繼檔色彩資訊。

trans-unit.source: An ImageAttributes object maintains several color-adjustment settings, including color-adjustment matrices, grayscale-adjustment matrices, gamma-correction values, color-map tables, and color-threshold values.
trans-unit.target: ImageAttributes 物件維持數個彩色調整設定，包括彩色調整矩陣、 灰階調整矩陣、 gamma 修正值、 色彩對應資料表，以及色彩臨界值。

trans-unit.source: During rendering, colors can be corrected, darkened, lightened, and removed.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現期間，色彩可以更正、 調暗、 淡化，並移除。

trans-unit.source: To apply such manipulations, initialize an ImageAttributes object and pass the path of that ImageAttributes object (along with the path of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>) to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用這類的操作，來初始化 ImageAttributes 物件，並傳遞該 ImageAttributes 物件的路徑 (路徑以及<xref:System.Drawing.Image>) 至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Clears the brush color-remap table of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 清除這個筆刷色彩重新對應表<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定一個預設分類的色彩重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的色彩重新對應表，仍筆刷分類不同的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the brush category, the default settings apply to the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您不指定任何筆刷分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至筆刷分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a default remap table that converts red to green, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的預設重新對應表轉換為綠色、 紅色，而且您指定預設 1.8 的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A> method, the default remap table (red to green) and the default gamma value (1.8) will not apply to brushes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A>方法，因此預設重新對應表 （紅色綠色） 及預設 gamma 值 (1.8) 不會套用到筆刷。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetBrushRemapTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later call the ClearBrushRemapTable method, the brush category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the brush category will have no remap table.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後呼叫 ClearBrushRemapTable 方法，筆刷分類不會還原成預設值重新對應表中。相反地，筆刷分類會有任何重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the brush category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the brush category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，筆刷分類不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，筆刷分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color key (transparency range) for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的色鍵 （透明度範圍）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定一個預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the color key (transparency range) for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類的色鍵 （透明度範圍）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定一個預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a default color key that makes any color with a red component from 200 through 255 transparent, and you specify a default gamma value of 1.8.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定預設色彩索引鍵，讓紅色元件 200 到 255 之間的任何色彩變成透明，而且您指定預設 1.8 的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color key of the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> method, the default color key and the default gamma value will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的色彩索引鍵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>方法、 預設的色彩索引鍵和預設 gamma 值不會套用到筆。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen color key by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default color key; rather, the pen category will have no color key.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除的畫筆色彩索引鍵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey%2A>方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的色彩索引鍵; 相反地，畫筆分類將沒有色彩索引鍵。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearColorKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color key is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定已清除的色彩索引鍵的分類。

trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Disables gamma correction for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 停用預設分類的 gamma 修正。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.

trans-unit.source: Later, you can reinstate color adjustment for the default category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 稍後，您可以藉由呼叫恢復預設分類的彩色調整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>

trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的 gamma 值，不同的 gamma 值點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類不同的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: You can disable color adjustment for a certain category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫停用將某個分類的彩色調整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>

trans-unit.source: Later, you can reinstate color adjustment for that category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 稍後，您可以藉由呼叫恢復該分類的彩色調整<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp%2A>

trans-unit.source: The color adjustment then returns to what was in place before the call to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 色彩調整然後返回功能已備妥<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp%2A>的呼叫之前

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the <xref uid="langword_csharp_NoOp" name="NoOp" href=""></xref> setting is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，其指定的分類<xref uid="langword_csharp_NoOp" name="NoOp" href=""></xref>已清除設定。

trans-unit.source: Clears the CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) output channel setting for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的 CMYK （青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色） 輸出色頻設定。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定在輸出通道的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) output channel setting for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類 （青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色） 輸出色頻設定。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定在輸出通道的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify an output channel and an adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定在輸出通道和預設分類調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: If you set the output channel for the bitmap category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> method, the default output channel will not apply to bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定輸出色頻點陣圖分類<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>方法，則預設輸出通道不會套用至點陣圖。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the bitmap output channel by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel%2A> method, the bitmap category will not revert to the default output channel; rather, the bitmap category will have no output channel setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後清除點陣圖藉由呼叫的輸出通道<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel%2A>方法中，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設輸出通道，而是點陣圖分類必須沒有輸出色頻設定。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the bitmap category will not revert to the default color-adjustment matrix; rather, the bitmap category will have no color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，點陣圖類別不會還原成預設的彩色調整矩陣。相反地，點陣圖分類會有任何彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the output channel setting is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定已清除輸出色頻設定的分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the output channel color profile setting for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類之輸出色頻色彩設定檔設定。

trans-unit.source: If you set the output channel profile for the bitmap category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> method, the default output channel profile will not apply to bitmaps.

trans-unit.source: Clears the color-remap table for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a remap table for the default category, a different remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的重新對應表，仍畫筆分類不同的重新對應表。

trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, then the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，然後預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a remap table and a gamma value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的重新對應表及預設分類的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the remap table for the pen category by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A> method, the default remap table will not apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的重新對應表<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A>方法，預設重新對應表不會套用到筆。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen remap table by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearRemapTable%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default remap table; rather, the pen category will have no remap table.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除畫筆重新對應表<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearRemapTable%2A>方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設值重新對應表; 相反地，畫筆分類會有任何重新對應表。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearRemapTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定已清除重新對應表的分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the threshold value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 清除預設分類的閾值。

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: 臨界值是從 0 到 1，指定每個色彩元件的截止點的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設臨界值設定為 0.7，並假設您要轉譯色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件 230、 50 和 220，分別是。

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: 紅色元件 (230) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以紅色元件將會變更到 255 之間 （完整強度）。

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: 綠色元件 (50) 小於 0.7 x 255, 讓綠色元件將會變更為 0。

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: 藍色元件 (220) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以藍色元件就會變更為 255。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a different threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的臨界值，不同的臨界值的點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類的不同臨界值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: Clears the threshold value for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 清除指定分類的臨界值。

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: 臨界值是從 0 到 1，指定每個色彩元件的截止點的值。

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x55, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: 紅色元件 (230) 大於 0.7x55，所以紅色元件將會變更到 255 之間 （完整強度）。

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: 綠色元件 (50) 小於 0.7 x 255, 讓綠色元件將會變更為 0。

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: 藍色元件 (220) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以藍色元件就會變更為 255。

trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由呼叫設定畫筆分類的閾值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetThreshold%2A>方法，這個方法的預設閾值不會套用到筆。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you later clear the pen threshold by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearThreshold%2A> method, the pen category will not revert to the default threshold; rather, the pen category will have no threshold.
trans-unit.target: 如果您稍後藉由呼叫清除畫筆閾值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearThreshold%2A>方法，畫筆類別不會還原成預設臨界值; 相反地，畫筆分類會有任何臨界值。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the pen category will not revert to the default gamma value; rather, the pen category will have no gamma value.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，畫筆類別不會還原成預設的 gamma 值。相反地，畫筆分類會有任何 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the threshold is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定已清除閾值的分類。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立的完全相同的複本<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object this class creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"> </xref>物件，這個類別會建立，轉換為物件。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>.</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>所佔用。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the colors in a palette according to the adjustment settings of a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 調整的調色盤，根據指定分類的調整設定中的色彩。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color-remap table for the default category, a different color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的色彩重新對應表 [點陣圖] 類別中，不同的色彩重新對應表，仍畫筆分類不同的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: When you call the GetAdjustedPalette method, you can specify the adjustment category that is used to adjust the palette colors.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫 GetAdjustedPalette 方法時，您可以指定用來調整調色盤色彩的調整類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pass <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the GetAdjustedPalette method, the adjustment settings of the bitmap category are used to adjust the palette colors.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>GetAdjustedPalette 方法中，點陣圖分類的調整設定可用來調整調色盤色彩。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette"></xref> that on input contains the palette to be adjusted, and on output contains the adjusted palette.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette"> </xref>上輸入，其中包含要進行調整的調色盤，並輸出包含調整過的調色盤。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category whose adjustment settings will be applied to the palette.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定其調整設定將套用至調色盤的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-remap table for the brush category.
trans-unit.target: 設定筆刷分類的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: A color-remap table is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structures.
trans-unit.target: 色彩重新對應表是陣列<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structure has two <xref:System.Drawing.Color> objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>結構有兩個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>物件︰ 其中一個，指定舊的色彩，另一個則指定對應的新色彩。</xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現期間，符合其中一個舊的色彩重新對應表中的任何色彩變更為對應的新色彩。

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetBrushRemapTable method has the same effect as passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 SetBrushRemapTable 方法已傳遞相同的效果<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetRemapTable%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: The specified remap table applies to items in metafiles that are filled with a brush.
trans-unit.target: 指定的重新對應表適用於使用筆刷填滿的中繼檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used only with metafiles.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅只用於中繼檔。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color key for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法設定的最高和最低色彩索引鍵的值，使其可以進行透明的色彩範圍。

trans-unit.source: Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 任何色彩，其三個元件 （紅色、 綠色、 藍色） 之間的對應元件的高低的色彩索引鍵的每個進行透明。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: The low color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 低色鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The high color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 高色鍵值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color key (transparency range) for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定分類的色鍵 （透明度範圍）。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the high and low color-key values so that a range of colors can be made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法設定的最高和最低色彩索引鍵的值，使其可以進行透明的色彩範圍。

trans-unit.source: Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.
trans-unit.target: 任何色彩，其三個元件 （紅色、 綠色、 藍色） 之間的對應元件的高低的色彩索引鍵的每個進行透明。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color key for the default category, a different color key for the bitmap category, and still a different color key for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的色彩索引鍵、 點陣圖分類，不同的色彩索引鍵和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color key for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由傳遞設定畫筆分類的色彩索引鍵<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A>方法，沒有預設值的調整設定將套用到畫筆。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorKey%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: The low color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 低色鍵值。

trans-unit.source: The high color-key value.
trans-unit.target: 高色鍵值。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color key is set.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定設定的色彩索引鍵的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix and the grayscale-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定彩色調整矩陣和灰階調整矩陣的預設分類。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify adjustment matrices for the default category, different adjustment matrices for the bitmap category, and still different adjustment matrices for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的調整矩陣、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的不同調整矩陣和畫筆分類不同的調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetColorMatrices method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName> method and passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> for the `flags` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 SetColorMatrices 方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>如`flags`參數。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrices%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specifies that all colors (including grays) are adjusted by the color-adjustment matrix, not the grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>指定會調整的彩色調整矩陣不灰階調整矩陣的所有色彩 （包括灰色）。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the grayscale-adjustment matrix passed to this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，傳遞至這個方法的灰階調整矩陣沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The grayscale-adjustment matrix.
trans-unit.target: 灰階調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix and the grayscale-adjustment matrix for the default category.

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag"></xref> that specifies the type of image and color that will be affected by the color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment matrices.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag"></xref>指定的影像和色彩將會受到彩色調整和灰階調整矩陣的型別。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment matrices are set.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定設定的彩色調整和灰階調整矩陣的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-adjustment matrix for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color-adjustment matrix for the default category, a different color-adjustment matrix for the bitmap category, and still a different color-adjustment matrix for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的彩色調整矩陣、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的不同彩色調整矩陣和仍然畫筆分類的不同彩色調整矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetColorMatrix method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName> method and passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> for the `flags` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 SetColorMatrix 方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法並傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>如`flags`參數。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%28System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrix%2CSystem.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specifies that all colors (including grays) are adjusted by the color-adjustment matrix
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>指定彩色調整矩陣調整的所有色彩 （包括灰色）</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMatrixFlag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color-adjustment matrix for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由傳遞設定畫筆分類的彩色調整矩陣<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A>方法，沒有預設值的調整設定將套用到畫筆。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetColorMatrix%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: Sets the gamma value for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: Typical values for the `gamma` parameter are from 1.0 to 2.2; however, values from 0.1 to 5.0 could prove useful in some circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 一般值`gamma`參數會從 1.0 2.2; 不過，從 0.1 到 5.0 的值無法證明在某些情況下很有用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a gamma value for the default category, a different gamma value for the bitmap category, and still a different gamma value for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的 gamma 值，不同的 gamma 值點陣圖分類，然後畫筆分類不同的 gamma 值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: Gamma values outside the usual range may be useful for old CRT monitors or for monitors that are in unusual lighting conditions, such as industrial environments or window displays.
trans-unit.target: 一般範圍以外的 gamma 值可能是適用於舊的 CRT 監視器或監視器的不尋常的光源的狀況，例如工業環境或視窗會顯示。

trans-unit.source: Turns off color adjustment for the default category.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.ClearNoOp*> method to reinstate the color-adjustment settings that were in place before the call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetNoOp*> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<> *> 方法，以重新啟用之前呼叫的進行中的彩色調整設定<> *> 方法。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which color correction is turned off.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定色彩修正已關閉的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) output channel for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的 CMYK （青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色） 輸出色。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> method to convert an image to a CMYK color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>方法將影像轉換成 CMYK 色彩空間，並檢查其中一個 CMYK 色彩頻道的強度。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you create an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object and set its bitmap output channel to <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您建立的<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件，並設定至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>其點陣圖輸出通道</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: If you pass the path of that <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method, the cyan component of each pixel is calculated, and each pixel in the rendered image is a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳入的路徑<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法，會計算青色元件的每個像素，而且所呈現影像的每個像素深淺程度的灰色，表示其青色通道的濃度。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can render images that indicate the intensities of the magenta, yellow, and black channels.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，您可以呈現影像，以指出洋紅色、 黃色及黑色通道的強度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.

trans-unit.target: 同樣地，您可以呈現影像，以指出洋紅色、 黃色及黑色通道的強度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an output channel for the default category and a different output channel for the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定在輸出通道的預設分類和點陣圖分類不同的輸出色頻。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您從來沒有指定任何點陣圖分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至點陣圖分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the output channel for the bitmap category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the SetOutputChannel method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由傳遞設定輸出色頻點陣圖分類<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>SetOutputChannel 方法中，沒有預設值的調整設定會套用至點陣圖。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag"></xref> that specifies the output channel.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag"> </xref> ，指定輸出色頻。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the output channel is set.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定設定輸出色頻的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the output channel color-profile file for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的輸出色頻色彩設定檔檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> methods to convert an image to a CMYK (cyan-magenta-yellow-black) color space and examine the intensities of one of the CMYK color channels.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>方法將影像轉換成 CMYK （青色-洋紅-黃色-黑色） 色彩空間，並檢查其中一個 CMYK 的強度色彩頻道。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you write code that performs the following steps: 1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您撰寫程式碼會執行下列步驟︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Pass <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>至<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannel%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorChannelFlag>

trans-unit.source: Pass the path name of a color profile file to the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至的色彩設定檔的路徑名稱<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetOutputChannelColorProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass the paths of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> and <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> objects to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的路徑<xref:System.Drawing.Image>和<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件加入至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will use the color-profile file to calculate the cyan component of each pixel in the image, and each pixel in the rendered image will be a shade of gray that indicates the intensity of its cyan channel.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]將用來計算青色元件的映像，在每個像素的色彩設定檔，並呈現影像的每個像素會成為陰影灰色，表示其青色通道的濃度。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the bitmap category, the default settings apply to the bitmap category.

trans-unit.source: The path name of a color-profile file.
trans-unit.target: 色彩設定檔路徑名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the color-profile file is in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Spool\Drivers\Color directory, this parameter can be the file name.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this parameter must be the fully qualified path name.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個參數必須是完整的路徑名稱。

trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定要設定輸出色頻色彩設定檔檔案的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-remap table for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: A color-remap table is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structures.
trans-unit.target: 色彩重新對應表是陣列<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structure has two <xref:System.Drawing.Color> objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>結構有兩個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>物件︰ 其中一個，指定舊的色彩，另一個則指定對應的新色彩。</xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現期間，符合其中一個舊的色彩重新對應表中的任何色彩變更為對應的新色彩。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定色彩重新對應預設分類、 [點陣圖] 類別中，色彩重新對應表和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: An array of color pairs of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 型別的色彩配對陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Each color pair contains an existing color (the first value) and the color that it will be mapped to (the second value).
trans-unit.target: 每個色彩配對包含現有色彩 （第一個值），它會對應到 （第二個值） 的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Sets the color-remap table for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定分類的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: A color-remap table is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structures.
trans-unit.target: 色彩重新對應表是陣列<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>結構。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap> structure has two <xref:System.Drawing.Color> objects: one that specifies an old color and one that specifies a corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>結構有兩個<xref:System.Drawing.Color>物件︰ 其中一個，指定舊的色彩，另一個則指定對應的新色彩。</xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap>

trans-unit.source: During rendering, any color that matches one of the old colors in the remap table is changed to the corresponding new color.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現期間，符合其中一個舊的色彩重新對應表中的任何色彩變更為對應的新色彩。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a color remap for the default category, a color-remap table for the bitmap category, and still a different color-remap table for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定色彩重新對應預設分類、 [點陣圖] 類別中，色彩重新對應表和仍然畫筆分類不同的色彩重新對應表。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the color-remap table for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the SetRemapTable method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由傳遞設定畫筆分類的色彩重新對應表<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>SetRemapTable 方法中，沒有預設值的調整設定會套用到筆。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: An array of color pairs of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 型別的色彩配對陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Each color pair contains an existing color (the first value) and the color that it will be mapped to (the second value).
trans-unit.target: 每個色彩配對包含現有色彩 （第一個值），它會對應到 （第二個值） 的色彩。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color-remap table is set.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定設定的色彩重新對應表的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the threshold (transparency range) for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 設定預設分類的閾值 （透明度範圍）。

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: 臨界值是從 0 到 1，指定每個色彩元件的截止點的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設臨界值設定為 0.7，並假設您要轉譯色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件 230、 50 和 220，分別是。

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: 紅色元件 (230) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以紅色元件將會變更到 255 之間 （完整強度）。

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: 綠色元件 (50) 小於 0.7 x 255, 讓綠色元件將會變更為 0。

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: 藍色元件 (220) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以藍色元件就會變更為 255。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的臨界值、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的臨界值和仍然畫筆分類的不同臨界值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: A real number that specifies the threshold value.
trans-unit.target: 指定的臨界值的實數。

trans-unit.source: Sets the threshold (transparency range) for a specified category.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定分類的閾值 （透明度範圍）。

trans-unit.source: The threshold is a value from 0 through 1 that specifies a cutoff point for each color component.
trans-unit.target: 臨界值是從 0 到 1，指定每個色彩元件的截止點的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the threshold is set to 0.7, and suppose you are rendering a color whose red, green, and blue components are 230, 50, and 220, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設臨界值設定為 0.7，並假設您要轉譯色彩的紅色、 綠色和藍色元件 230、 50 和 220，分別是。

trans-unit.source: The red component (230) is greater than 0.7x255, so the red component will be changed to 255 (full intensity).
trans-unit.target: 紅色元件 (230) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以紅色元件將會變更到 255 之間 （完整強度）。

trans-unit.source: The green component (50) is less than 0.7x255, so the green component will be changed to 0.
trans-unit.target: 綠色元件 (50) 小於 0.7 x 255, 讓綠色元件將會變更為 0。

trans-unit.source: The blue component (220) is greater than 0.7x255, so the blue component will be changed to 255.
trans-unit.target: 藍色元件 (220) 大於 0.7 x 255, 所以藍色元件就會變更為 255。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes> object maintains color and grayscale settings for five adjustment categories: default, bitmap, brush, pen, and text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>物件會維護色彩及灰階五個調整類別設定︰ 預設、 點陣圖、 筆刷、 畫筆、 和文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a threshold for the default category, a threshold for the bitmap category, and still a different threshold for the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定預設分類的臨界值、 「 點陣圖 」 類別目錄的臨界值和仍然畫筆分類的不同臨界值。

trans-unit.source: The default color-adjustment and grayscale-adjustment settings apply to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own.
trans-unit.target: 預設的彩色調整和灰階調整設定套用至沒有自己的調整設定的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you never specify any adjustment settings for the pen category, the default settings apply to the pen category.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您不指定任何筆分類的調整設定，預設設定會套用至畫筆分類。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you specify a color-adjustment or grayscale-adjustment setting for a certain category, the default adjustment settings no longer apply to that category.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的彩色調整或將某個分類的灰階調整設定，因為預設調整設定不會再套用到該類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you specify a collection of adjustment settings for the default category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您指定的調整設定預設分類的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you set the threshold for the pen category by passing <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType> to the SetThreshold method, none of the default adjustment settings will apply to pens.
trans-unit.target: 如果您藉由傳遞設定畫筆分類的閾值<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>SetThreshold 方法中，沒有預設值的調整設定會套用到筆。</xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType>

trans-unit.source: A threshold value from 0.0 to 1.0 that is used as a breakpoint to sort colors that will be mapped to either a maximum or a minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 臨界值，介於 0.0 到 1.0 之間，做為將會對應到最大值或最小值的排序色彩中斷點。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"></xref> that specifies the category for which the color threshold is set.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorAdjustType"> </xref> ，指定要設定色彩閾值的分類。

trans-unit.source: Sets the wrap mode that is used to decide how to tile a texture across a shape, or at shape boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 設定用來決定如何越形狀或在形狀界限並排紋理的環繞模式。

trans-unit.source: A texture is tiled across a shape to fill it in when the texture is smaller than the shape it is filling.
trans-unit.target: 跨圖形來填入，當紋理小於它正在填滿的形狀時，紋理會並排顯示。

trans-unit.source: Calling the SetWrapMode method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29> and passing <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for the `color` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 SetWrapMode 方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29>和傳遞<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如`color`參數。</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes.SetWrapMode%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode%2CSystem.Drawing.Color%29>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName> specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指定的呈現影像外部的像素的色彩。</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This color is visible if the mode parameter is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode> and the source rectangle passed to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> method is larger than the image itself.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩時，會顯示模式參數設定為<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode>來源矩形傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A>方法大於影像本身。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode>

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> ，指定如何重複的影像複用於磚的區域。

trans-unit.source: Sets the wrap mode and color used to decide how to tile a texture across a shape, or at shape boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 設定環繞模式和用來決定如何越形狀或在形狀界限並排紋理的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A texture is tiled across a shape to fill it in when the texture is smaller than the shape it is filling.
trans-unit.target: 跨圖形來填入，當紋理小於它正在填滿的形狀時，紋理會並排顯示。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> ，指定如何重複的影像複用於磚的區域。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"></xref> object that specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes"> </xref>指定呈現影像外部的像素色彩的物件。

trans-unit.source: This color is visible if the mode parameter is set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> and the source rectangle passed to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*> is larger than the image itself.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩時，會顯示模式參數設定為<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref>來源矩形傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*>大於影像本身。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the wrap mode and color used to decide how to tile a texture across a shape, or at shape boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 設定環繞模式和用來決定如何越形狀或在形狀界限並排紋理的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A texture is tiled across a shape to fill it in when the texture is smaller than the shape it is filling.
trans-unit.target: 跨圖形來填入，當紋理小於它正在填滿的形狀時，紋理會並排顯示。

trans-unit.source: An element of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area.
trans-unit.target: 項目<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"> </xref> ，指定如何重複的影像複用於磚的區域。

trans-unit.source: A color object that specifies the color of pixels outside of a rendered image.
trans-unit.target: 指定呈現影像外部的像素色彩的色彩物件。

trans-unit.source: This color is visible if the mode parameter is set to <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref> and the source rectangle passed to <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*> is larger than the image itself.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩時，會顯示模式參數設定為<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WrapMode"></xref>來源矩形傳遞至<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*>大於影像本身。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawImage*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數沒有任何作用。
